meanings: 관광지·생활 The Night Watchman Tour in Ribe

vlive.korean: 이도 형 경비원 아니시죠? Lee Do, are you a security guard? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]ONEUS X LieV - 원어스의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Lee Do, are you a security guard?

vlive.korean: "경비원한테 남겼는데..." "I left it to the security guard..." 듣기 View video Apink : 뽀로로로로롱
vlive.english: "I left it to the security guard..."

vlive.korean: 경비원입니다, 호텔을 지키는 경비원. But I'm a security guard of the hotel. 듣기 View video EXID : [EXID(이엑스아이디)] BUTBUT TV 5 EP#04
vlive.english: But I'm a security guard of the hotel.

examples.korean: Guards patrol the perimeter of the estate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경비원들이 그 사유지 주위를 순찰한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Guards patrol the perimeter of the estate. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He throttled the guard with his bare hands. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 맨손으로 경비원의 목을 졸라 죽였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He throttled the guard with his bare hands. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Security guards make regular patrols at night. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 밤에는 경비원들이 정기적으로 순찰을 돈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Security guards make regular patrols at night. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The thieves had roped the guard’s feet together. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 도둑들이 밧줄로 경비원의 두 발을 함께 묶어 놓은 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The thieves had roped the guard’s feet together. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She ran out of the shop, hotly pursued by the store detective. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그 상점에서 뛰쳐나가자 상점 경비원이 열심히 뒤쫓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She ran out of the shop, hotly pursued by the store detective. Add to Wordbook
